title: Looking to start a ranked team
body:
This doesn't have to be a super serious team. At this point, I just want some people to play and improve with. My real life friend, who got me into the game, barely plays anymore and trashes the game even as he's playing it. Additionally, he's become a shell of his former self in terms of his play and, despite his talk about wanting things to be fun again, his attitude kills any fun we might have.

What made me come to love this game was seeing myself get better and getting to have some fun while doing it. But when you seem to be the only one with the right attitude, that's not really in the cards.

All I ask of any hopefuls is that the following things apply to you:

1.) You're focused upon improving, as well as helping others improve.
2.) You're not toxic.
3.) You take the game seriously.
4.) You're available to play after 8pm EST.

Those four things are pretty much all that matter. I'd like to use voice chat, obviously, but which program is up to whatever everyone wants. I don't really have a preference one way or another. And, as far as positions are concerned, I'm a support main, but can also go top if necessary as it's what I used to main.

So, if you're interested, you can post here with some information about yourself, or friend me in game. It doesn't really matter which. Whenever I'm available, we'll play, see how things go, and I'll decide whether you make the team or not based on that. As #4 suggests, that tends to be after 8pm EST, as I get off work between 8-11 most nights and play for at least a couple hours.

Thanks for your time and interest!
